Entrance.description:
After your friend disappears looking for a way out you have to decide what area of the house you want to look first. 
 You see stairs leading up to your north. 
 A kitchen to your west 
 and a Library to your east.

Kitchen.description:
You enter the dirty kitchen and are approached by a cat with what appears to be a key around its collar, 
you reach for it thinking it could be a key to a way out.  The cat runs out of arms distance.
  You look around the kitchen for anything to lure the cat back out, you see a knife, fish, and pan.

Dining Room.description: You enter the dining room and right away you notice a butler standing in the corner with a tray.

Library.description: You enter the library and notice a wall of bookshelves, they all appear to be dusty and covered in cobwebs besides one section that looks clean and has a book missing.

Main Bedroom.description:
You approach the main bedroom but it is locked and requires a key. 
 Have you collected the key?

Second Bedroom.description: you enter the second bedroom and see a maid standing in the room looking out the window

Bathroom.description: In the bathroom you see a bunch of random items on the sink, a skeleton key catches your eye poking out slightly under a box

Stairs.description:
as you stand at the top of the stairs you see three directions you could check. 
 to the east is a second bedroom- 
 to the west is a main bedroom 
 or south and go back to the entrance

Secret Room1.description:
Once you enter the room you notice a passage going down through the floor. 
 you can go south and see where the passage leads 
 or go north back into the library

Passage.description: You enter the dark passage that has a ladder going down into a dimly lit room

Basement.description: as you emerge out of the passage you enter a dimly lit room, you look around as your eyes adjust to the light.  You notice dusty items scattered throughout the room besides a tall metal door on the other side.  As you approach the door you see it is locked with a rusty padlock.  Do you have the key in your bag?

Secret room2.description:
This room is locked, once unlocked you open the door to bright lights being turned on 
 and you hear people yelling “SURPRISE”, as your vision comes back you see your friend 
 that you came there with and about 20 other friends standing in the room.  
 Now you can enjoy your surprise party, YOU WIN!
